titles.title: DIC Rate Equity Act of 1988

A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to increase the rates of dependency and indemnity compensation (DIC) payable to surviving spouses of veterans who have died from service-connected disabilities.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

bill.summary: 4/20/1988--Introduced. DIC Rate Equity Act of 1988 - Increases the rates of dependency and indemnity compensation payable to surviving spouses and children of veterans who have died from service-connected disabilities.
